item.title: Hello World
item.description: Hello World This is my first post on my personal website!

item.title: About
item.description: Hi there! My name is Aman Thanvi. Welcome to my personal website! I am a computer science student with a passion for cybersecurity competition and research. I especially like competing in caputure-the-flag competitions (CTFs) and exploring different areas of cybersecurity. Here is some more info about me: Education Sophomore at the University of Maryland, College Park Major: Computer Science, Cybersecurity specialization Minor: Advanced Cybersecurity Experience for Students (ACES)

item.description: Nothing here yet, but planning on adding some soon!
